title: Official Blind Review #2
review:
This paper introduces active learning for graphs using graph neural networks

The bound is not very meaningful as it requires unrealistic assumptions and is loose. 

Figure 2 shows that even random selection performs quite well compared to this elaborate method. 

This Area if research and the data sets don’t seem to have many actual real applications in the world with much impact.
